Now, code:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>

int compare_desc(const void *a, const void *b) {
    int x = *(const int *)a;
    int y = *(const int *)b;
    if (x > y) return -1;
    if (x < y) return 1;
    return 0;
}

int main() {
    int N;
    scanf("%d", &N);
    while (getchar() != '\n'); // consume newline after N

    char buffer[1000000];
    fgets(buffer, sizeof(buffer), stdin);

    int len_S = 0;
    int *S = NULL;
    char *token = strtok(buffer, " \n");
    while (token != NULL) {
        S = realloc(S, (len_S + 1) * sizeof(int));
        S[len_S] = atoi(token);
        len_S++;
        token = strtok(NULL, " \n");
    }

    qsort(S, len_S, sizeof(int), compare_desc);

    int *used = malloc(len_S * sizeof(int));
    for (int i = 0; i < len_S; i++) {
        used[i] = 1;
    }
    if (len_S == 0) {
        printf("No\n");
        return 0;
    }
    used[0] = 0;

    int *cur = malloc(sizeof(int));
    cur[0] = S[0];
    int cur_size = 1;

    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
        int jM = cur_size;
        int *temp = malloc(jM * sizeof(int));
        int found_all = 1;

        for (int j = 0; j < jM; j++) {
            int found = 0;
            for (int k = 0; k < len_S; k++) {
                if (used[k] && S[k] < cur[j]) {
                    temp[j] = S[k];
                    used[k] = 0;
                    found = 1;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if (!found) {
                found_all = 0;
                break;
            }
        }

        if (!found_all) {
            printf("No\n");
            free(temp);
            free(cur);
            free(S);
            free(used);
            return 0;
        }

        cur = realloc(cur, 2 * jM * sizeof(int));
        memcpy(cur + jM, temp, jM * sizeof(int));
        free(temp);
        cur_size *= 2;
        qsort(cur, cur_size, sizeof(int), compare_desc);
    }

    printf("Yes\n");

    free(cur);
    free(S);
    free(used);

    return 0;
}
